= Proposal: Thermo MK2 for Apache Flex =

== Introduction ==

This proposed Design Tool (codenamed Thermo MK2) should be seen as a hybrid of [http://www.adobe.com/devnet/flashcatalyst/articles/introducing-flashcatalyst-cs55.html Flash Catalyst CS5.5], the "Design View" of [http://www.adobe.com/products/flash-builder.html Flash Builder 4.6] and the [http://www.eclipse.org Eclipse] IDE.

Things you can do with this app so far:
 * Switching Perspectives (top-right) ... more information about Perspectives see [http://www.eclipse.org Eclipse].
 * Switching between Source- and Design-Mode (text editor in the middle) ... more information about the "Design View" see [http://www.adobe.com/products/flash-builder.html Flash Builder 4.6]

The source code follows certain Architectual Patterns summarized as [http://code.google.com/p/masuland/wiki/LoginExample#Flex_4.5_(Spark)_with_MVCpshCtlDS_PInj MVCpshCtlDS_PInj]. For more information about other coding structures please check out this [http://code.google.com/p/masuland/wiki/LoginExample Login Example]
and this [http://code.google.com/p/masuland/wiki/ApplicationDevelopmentProcedure Application Coding Procedure].

 * [NanoarchitectureVCb "View - Component" (VCp)]
 * [NanoarchitectureCpsh "C-Push" (Cpsh)]
 * [NanoarchitecturePInj "Property Injection" (PInj)]
 * [NanoarchitectureM "Model" (M)]
 * [NanoarchitectureCtl "Controller" (Ctl)]
 * "Delegate" (D)
 * "Service" (S)
